intro: The sky’s the limit - climb higher than ever before!
description:
Prepare yourself for an exhilarating ride upwards in ONLY UP! REMASTER, the ultimate remastered version of the classic vertical adventure. Ascend through impossible heights, challenge your limits, and push your reflexes to the edge in this heart-racing, one-of-a-kind experience.

In ONLY UP! REMASTER, you’re on a quest to reach the highest point imaginable.Each jump, climb, and leap brings you closer to the sky, but with each step comes the risk of falling back down.

Key Features:
- Challenging Vertical Progression – Navigate increasingly difficult platforms, ledges, and gaps in a climb where every mistake counts.
- Immersive Environments: Explore diverse, dynamic landscapes that evolve as you climb higher.
- Precision Platforming: Every jump matters—perfect your timing and skills to reach new heights.
- Intense Replayability: Test your limits with new difficulty settings and endless vertical challenges.
- Tight Parkour Mechanics – Enjoy fluid movement and responsive controls built for intense precision platforming.

ONLY UP! REMASTER is more than just a climb—it’s a battle against gravity, doubt, and failure. How far will you go when the only way forward is up?
